attributes.action: Make Equal Parenting Law after the breakdown of the relationship
attributes.background: Stop denying parents their rights to see their children; as well as the extended family. Both parents on birth certificate. Both must have a say on the welfare and up bringing of their children. Both parents and families must be treated equally. Where needed access must be supervised at all times.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition calling for an automatic presumption of 50/50 shared custody of children, if that's what you'd like to happen.
